variable.name: CONSENT
variable.value: Disease Specific (Cystic Fibrosis; the use of the data from the consent group of University of Washington is limited to genetic research that facilitates discovery of variation related to cystic fibrosis.)
GRU (General Research Use; the use of the data from the consent group of Universities of North Carolina is limited to the general research use.)

variable.name: SOURCE_SUBJID
variable.description: Subject ID used in the Source Repository

variable.name: AFFECTION_STATUS
variable.comment: "Cases" are subjects with chronic Pseudomonas aeruginosa (P.a.); "Controls" are subjects who never showed P.a. positive cultures in consecutive quarters, or only late in life.
